sentences.en: 9 percent interest less 7 percent inflation equals 2 percent.
sentences.cn: 9%的利息减去7%的通货膨胀率等于2%。

sentences.en: Bob Dole seemed less than enthusiastic about the proposed move.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃·多尔似乎对提议的这项行动不太感兴趣。

sentences.en: Doctors recommend eating less salt.
sentences.cn: 医生建议少吃盐。

sentences.en: He had a less than favorable view of the matter.
sentences.cn: 他对那种事情根本不抱好感

sentences.en: He had returned to England in an aircraft carrier no less.
sentences.cn: 他竟然坐航空母舰回的英格兰。

sentences.en: He wants to be seen as less bossy and high-handed.
sentences.cn: 他不想让自己显得太专横霸道。

sentences.en: I see less of any of my friends than I used to.
sentences.cn: 我见所有朋友都比以前少了。

sentences.en: I'm not blaming anyone, much less you.
sentences.cn: 我根本就没有责怪任何人，更不用说你了

sentences.en: In less than two hours Cohen capitulated to virtually every demand.
sentences.cn: 还不到两个小时，科恩就屈服了，接受了几乎一切要求。

sentences.en: In recent years she has appeared in public less frequently.
sentences.cn: 近年来她在公开场合露面的次数少了。

sentences.en: Less than a half hour later he returned upstairs.
sentences.cn: 不到半个小时，他又跑上楼来。

sentences.en: Maybe he would worry less if he understood the situation.
sentences.cn: 他要是了解情况，也许就不会那么担心了。

sentences.en: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: Peter cooked dinner—fillet steak and champagne, no less.
sentences.cn: 彼得居然做出了饭——里脊扒和香槟酒。

sentences.en: The region's hard-pressed consumers are spending less on luxuries.
sentences.cn: 该地区的消费者经济窘迫，在奢侈品上的开销比以前少了。

sentences.en: There was less receptiveness to liberalism in some areas.
sentences.cn: 在一些地区自由主义并不怎么受欢迎。

sentences.en: Together they account for less than five per cent of the population.
sentences.cn: 他们总共占不到总人口的5%。

sentences.en: We decided, more or less on a whim, to sail to Morocco.
sentences.cn: 我们多少有点心血来潮，决定航海去摩洛哥。

sentences.en: We have to develop a less amateurish approach to our organisa-tions.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使我们对待自己组织的态度变得较为专业。

sentences.en: what woman would consider a date with him, much less a marriage?.
sentences.cn: 什么样的女人愿意跟他约会，更不要说嫁给他了？。

sentences.en: Women are sometimes seen to be less effective as managers.
sentences.cn: 女性有时被认为不善于管理。

phrases.tran_cn: 最不可能的是；较少可能
与…不相上于；与…几乎相同
［表示比刚刚说过的事更不可能或更不适合］更不要说
［用于表示某事令人惊讶或给人留下深刻印象，常为讽刺］竟，居然

trans.tran_en: a smaller amount or not as much

trans.tran_cn: 较少地，较小地，更少，较小
trans.tran_en: not so much or to a smaller degree
taking away or not including a particular amount
